transcription_sentences.speaker: sales_rep
transcription_sentences.text: Hi Zhi, this is Arjun from MongoDB. Did I catch you with a minute to chat?

transcription_sentences.speaker: prospect
transcription_sentences.text: Uh, hey Arjun. I have a few minutes, but I’ll need to be brief. What’s this about?

transcription_sentences.speaker: sales_rep
transcription_sentences.text: Of course, I’ll keep it short. I saw Acme Corp. just rolled out some new AI features. Congrats on that—big move.

transcription_sentences.speaker: prospect
transcription_sentences.text: Thanks. It’s been… a lot. What are you calling about?

transcription_sentences.speaker: sales_rep
transcription_sentences.text: I wanted to talk briefly about MongoDB Atlas—our cloud database service—because I think it could really support what you’re building, especially as AI workloads scale.

transcription_sentences.speaker: prospect
transcription_sentences.text: We’re actually pretty invested in Snowflake right now. That’s our main stack.

transcription_sentences.speaker: sales_rep
transcription_sentences.text: Yeah, totally get it. Snowflake’s excellent for analytics. But we see fintechs using MongoDB Atlas alongside it—for real-time, high-velocity data from transactional apps or AI models. Are you running into any gaps there?

transcription_sentences.speaker: prospect
transcription_sentences.text: Honestly, maybe. But migration is a big risk for us. We have compliance stuff to worry about, too.

transcription_sentences.speaker: sales_rep
transcription_sentences.text: I hear that a lot. Just to clarify—most of our fintech clients actually keep Snowflake for analytics and bring in Atlas where they need flexible, secure data and super low latency. We don't push for a full switch.

transcription_sentences.speaker: prospect
transcription_sentences.text: Okay, but, I mean… data movement and integration between platforms is still tricky.

transcription_sentences.speaker: sales_rep
transcription_sentences.text: Absolutely. That’s why we have connectors and real-time sync tools—so data flows between Snowflake and Atlas smoothly. Our team typically supports that migration, and a lot of it’s automated.

transcription_sentences.speaker: prospect
transcription_sentences.text: Can you send over some info on how you handle compliance? We’re under some heavy FISMA and PCI pressure.

transcription_sentences.speaker: sales_rep
transcription_sentences.text: For sure. MongoDB Atlas is certified for SOC 2, PCI DSS, and more—we can send you the full documentation. Our enterprise customers in finance lean on us specifically for that.

transcription_sentences.speaker: prospect
transcription_sentences.text: Alright. Honestly, budget’s tight too, so I’m not promising anything right now.

transcription_sentences.speaker: sales_rep
transcription_sentences.text: Totally fair—I wouldn’t expect a decision from one call. What if I send over a brief summary, pricing info, and some case studies? Then we can chat if it makes sense.

transcription_sentences.speaker: prospect
transcription_sentences.text: Yeah, that’s fine. Email works best. I’ll look it over when I get a chance.

transcription_sentences.speaker: sales_rep
transcription_sentences.text: Perfect, thanks Zhi. I’ll get that out to you in the next hour. Really appreciate your time.

transcription_sentences.speaker: prospect
transcription_sentences.text: Alright Arjun, thanks. Have a good one.
